amendment.description: Amendment places comprehensive sanctions on Iranians involved in kidnapping or unjustly detaining US citizens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-781 to impose sanctions on Iranians involved in kidnapping or unjustly detaining US citizens.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A003) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Pompeo amendment (A003) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Pompeo.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A003) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
